channel.title: Wifimapper on GoWi.Fi
channel.description: Recent content in Wifimapper on GoWi.Fi

item.title: The perfect combination: WifiMapper and GoWi.Fi
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: We have kept an eye on an exciting London based Startup called OpenSignal. They have tapped into the fact that the global use of smartphones is leading to the rise of a wide-spread mobile sensor network. They are calling it “one of the most exciting technological innovations of recent times.” WifiMapper Recently they built WifiMapper, which they call “the best free-Wi-Fi database in the world,” which users can tap into to instantly to find the nearest (and best) free Internet service.
